name: WHO cares the sun
description:
Then of Wall Break I continued with the second game, I didn't need to like it, but I need to develop it to be liked by my best friend (Another whovian).

A little movile videogame inspired in the TV show, Doctor Who, with "original" characters, like the main: The Director. Who need to stop the misterious sun explotion by recolecting some strange crystals named Skimzya. These crystals are distributed in every planet in the solar system, his home.

The Director will be helped by two friends, The Designer. A free space traveler who never finds his home. And The Analyzer, a space researcher.
